Contact.heading: Need help or have any questions? We are here to assist
Contact.form-message: The support team is active everyday from 8am to 8pm, so you can always email or call us.
Contact.name: Name
Contact.subject: Subject
Contact.requirement-email: Please enter a valid email address
Contact.requirement-message: Message must be at least 10 characters

CreateProduct.name-en-min: Product name (English) must be at least 3 characters.
CreateProduct.name-ka-min: Product name (Georgian) must be at least 3 characters.
CreateProduct.description-en-min: Product description (English) must be at least 20 characters.
CreateProduct.description-ka-min: Product description (Georgian) must be at least 20 characters.
CreateProduct.requirement-image-url: Please upload a valid image format
CreateProduct.requirement-image: At least one image is required.
CreateProduct.price-positive: Price must be a positive number.
CreateProduct.message1: To sell more, please provide product details in both English and Georgian.
CreateProduct.message2: For the best display, please upload square images (1:1 ratio).
CreateProduct.error-image-size: Total file size exceeds the 5MB limit. Please upload smaller images.
CreateProduct.error-body-limit: The uploaded files are too large. Please try again with smaller images.
CreateProduct.error-unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

CreateBlog.requirement-heading-en: English heading must be at least 10 characters.
CreateBlog.requirement-heading-ka: Georgian heading must be at least 10 characters.
CreateBlog.requirement-content-en: English content must be at least 100 characters.
CreateBlog.requirement-content-ka: Georgian content must be at least 100 characters.
CreateBlog.message1: Write your blog in both English and Georgian to reach a wider audience.
CreateBlog.message2: More people will engage with your content!
CreateBlog.message3: For the best display, please upload square images (1:1 ratio).

ProductDetails.whole-number: Quantity must be a whole number.
ProductDetails.max-quantity: You can add a maximum of 5 items.
ProductDetails.result-fail: Something went wrong. Please try again.

Profile.invalid-full-name: Please enter your full name (first and last name).
Profile.invalid-phone: Phone number must be 9 to 13 digits.
Profile.invalid-phone-format: Phone number must contain only numbers and an optional leading '+'
Profile.invalid-address: Please enter a valid address (at least 20 characters)
Profile.retry: Something went wrong. Please try again.

NotFound.title: Page Not Found
NotFound.description: The page you are looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
